headline: Semi truck fire in Trumbull County
author: Michael Reiner
sentences: WARREN TOWNSHIP, Ohio (WKBN)- Firefighters were called to a semi truck on fire early Thursday morning.
Crews were called to Short Stop Truck Service on West Market Street just after 4 a.m.
Crews confirmed that the fire is out.
A cause has not yet been identified.
Injuries are not known at this time.
